questions.title: What do you think is the best painting of myself?
questions.tip: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen

questions.title: What's the other name of Mona Lisa?
My best friends are...
questions.tip: Life is pretty simple: You do some stuff. Most fails. Some works. You do more of what works. If it works big, others quickly copy it. Then you do something else. The trick is the doing something else
